channel.title: Crypted - Text Based Game
channel.description:
Crypted is a text based game using RS content. I used the basic source Epic Steve showed me , and i didn't really do all that much , i deleted a few classes and added 2 methods and started coding , but that's really all you need with a text based game anyways.... So yeah , credits to Epic Steve =D
so far i've got [b]mining[/b] , [b]woodcutting[/b] and [b]smelting[/b] up. without the lvl reqs because i still have to write lvl updating. Also , player saving / loading hasnt been added yet but im working on it =D In the future i will also add some sort of combat to it , idk how but it will definately be turn based...
the commands are added in the readme file http://www.mediafire.com/?57biqz3k5kksqsr

item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Epic Steve:

Ah, yea, the rooms. You know, you can also add colour to the output strings by calling the writeToOutput(Color c, String text) method. (:

yeah , i noticed that method , but i didn’t try to call it as of yet

item.title: Crypted - Text Based Game
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:3, topic:383145”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=478922.msg3506153#msg3506153 date=1298167950]
This section is for anything NOT runescape related
[/quote]
It’s not runescape related. I could go out and cut a tree down, doesn’t mean it’s runescape related. Runescape doesn’t have a copyright on cutting down trees.

Ontopic. Well done on your first text based game. What classes did you remove?[/quote]

lemme check , …
user , room , roomdata and item classes , also editted the remaining files so the only remaining thing is the input of strings and making them appear on the screen.

Read full topic

Crypted is a text based game using RS content.
I used the basic source Epic Steve showed me , and i didn’t really do all that much , i deleted a few classes and added 2 methods and started coding , but that’s really all you need with a text based game anyways…
So yeah , credits to Epic Steve =D

so far i’ve got mining , woodcutting and smelting up.
without the lvl reqs because i still have to write lvl updating.
Also , player saving / loading hasnt been added yet but im working on it =D
